# candidateList

**Type Property**

The standard identifier for a candidate list bar item.

## Declaration

```swift
static let candidateList: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier
```

## Discussion

This value is the identifier for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCandidateListTouchBarItem]. Use a candidate list bar item to show word completion candidates to assist users typing text.

## Creating identifiers for multiple choice items

- **characterPicker**: The standard identifier for selecting special characters such as Emoji.
